oneOf.description: A class representing a file in the inference.sh ecosystem.
oneOf.title: File

prompt.description: The text prompt used to edit the image. Describe what you want to change or create in the image.
prompt.title: Prompt

image_urls.description: List of input images for editing. Up to 10 images are allowed. If over 10 images are sent, only the last 10 will be used.
image_urls.title: Image Urls

width.description: Width of the generated image in pixels. If not specified, uses the width of the first input image.
width.title: Width

height.description: Height of the generated image in pixels. If not specified, uses the height of the first input image.
height.title: Height

num_images.description: Number of separate model generations to be run with the prompt.
num_images.title: Num Images

max_images.description: If set to a number greater than one, enables multi-image generation. The model will potentially return up to max_images images every generation. The total number of images (inputs + outputs) must not exceed 15.
max_images.title: Max Images

seed.description: Random seed to control the stochasticity of image generation.
seed.title: Seed

sync_mode.description: If True, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.
sync_mode.title: Sync Mode

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker
